level.text: The Board shall make investigator reports available to the parties of a contested case at least two days prior to the date of the protest hearing or catered site protest hearing.

level.heading: SOURCE
level.text: Final Rulemaking published at 51 DCR 4309 (April 30, 2004); as amended by Final Rulemaking published at 55 DCR 12991 (December 26, 2008).
